tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE tutorial_category (
  tutorial_id INT,
  category_id INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (tutorial_id, category_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (tutorial_id) REFERENCES tutorials(tutorial_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES categories(category_id)
);

CREATE TABLE tutorial_skill_levels (
    tutorial_id UUID NOT NULL,
    level_id UUID NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (tutorial_id, level_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (tutorial_id) REFERENCES tutorials(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (level_id) REFERENCES skill_levels(id)
);

CREATE TABLE tutorial_techniques (
    tutorial_id UUID NOT NULL,
    technique_id UUID NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (tutorial_id, technique_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (tutorial_id) REFERENCES tutorials(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (technique_id) REFERENCES techniques(id)
);
